basicProcessing(adata) → None[source]

Basic Preprocessing Steps, including: 1. Filtering cells 2. Normalization by counts per cell, every cell has the same total count after normalization 3. Logarithm Transformation :param adata: reference data :return: None (Default inplace = True)
